definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: You are my merbromin, he just a black coffee.
sentences.chinese: 妳是我的紅藥水，他只是杯黑咖啡。

sentences.english: Act. 6 You are my merbromin, he just a black coffee.
sentences.chinese: 第六章“你是我的紅藥水，他只是杯黑咖啡。”

sentences.english: Wound from in outwards daub by mercurochrome, dry, don't dip in water.
sentences.chinese: 在傷口處由裏向外塗抹紅藥水，晾乾，不要沾水。

definition: to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
to claw wildly/to scratch frantically/to arrest people indiscriminately
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities

definition: please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
to form a scar/to form a scab
